item.title: Help with makemem command
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("iceman")) {
   try {
      String victim = command.substring(8);
      sendMessage(""+victim+"");
      BufferedWriter bw = null;
   bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true));
   bw.write(""+victim+"");
   bw.newLine();
   bw.flush();
      }
   catch(IOException ioexception) {
         misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file.");
      }
   }
}

That’ll work

item.title: Help with makemem command
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

It keeps putting a space before the name… can someome fix this

else if (command.startsWith(“makemem”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(7);
sendMessage(""+victim+"");
BufferedWriter bw = null;
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/members.txt”, true));
bw.write(""+victim+"");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
}
catch(IOException ioexception) {
misc.println(“membership.txt: error loading file.”);
}
}
}

Read full topic
